name: hardily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of plants) in a way that shows the ability to live through the winter without protection from the weather: This kind of plant can thrive hardily even in colder climates.
in a way that shows the strength to bear extreme conditions or difficult situations: The soldiers hardily trekked across the shallow, muddy river. Related word
hardy
More examplesFewer examplesThe herb garden stayed hardily alive through the long winter and thrived again in the summer. The band's popularity has hardily endured, and fifty years later, young listeners still look for their songs. She had lived hardily through many Canadian winters, so a sudden cold snap didn't faze her.
